India is seriously considering a bid to host the 2036 Olympic Games, Indian sports minister Anurag Thakur said.
The worlds second-most populous nation has previously hosted the Asian Games and the C… [+1494 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Pakistan name Sharjeel, Masood and Abrar in probable list for NZ ODIs - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Shaheen and Zaman continue to miss out, as the final squad will be trimmed to 16 players next week
articles.content: Sharjeel Khan last played an ODI in 2017, against Australia  •  Getty Images
